channel.title: Cong Peng on Cong Peng
channel.description: Recent content in Cong Peng on Cong Peng

item.title: Meaningful Integration of Data from Heterogeneous Health Services and Home Environment Based on Ontology
Linkedinfo.co
item.description:
The Web should be an open web. All the informations published on the Web are meant to be shared, share through links by search engines, rss, social networks, etc. This site is yet another method that tries to link all the informations (but starts with only technical articles on LinkedInfo) and share them.

The original idea of this side project is to utilize Semantic Web technologies to link the informations. Noble ambition shall start from basic, it needs to be improved little by little.

item.title: An Ontological Approach to Integrate Health Resources from Different Categories of Services
Fuzzy Matching of OpenAPI Described REST Services
Linking Health Web Services as Resource Graph by Semantic REST Resource Tagging
Using Tag based Semantic Annotation to Empower Client and REST Service Interaction
Flexible System Architecture of PHR to Support Sharing Health Data for Chronic Disease Self-Management
Sharing health data through hybrid cloud for self-management
